  <section class="section-card">
    <h2>Reach Me</h2>
    <p>If you'd like to reach out directly, please use the form below and I'll get back to you.</p>

    <style>
    .contact-form label { display:block; margin-top:0.6rem; font-weight:600; }
    .contact-form input[type="text"], .contact-form input[type="email"], .contact-form textarea {
      width:100%; padding:0.6rem; margin-top:0.3rem; border-radius:8px; border:1px solid rgba(148,163,184,0.12);
      background: transparent; color: inherit; box-sizing: border-box;
    }
    .contact-form textarea { min-height:120px; resize:vertical; }
    .contact-form .btn-submit { margin-top:0.8rem; display:inline-block; background: linear-gradient(135deg,#4f46e5,#6366f1); color:white; padding:0.6rem 1rem; border-radius:10px; text-decoration:none; border:0; cursor:pointer; }
    .contact-form .form-msg { margin-top:0.7rem; font-size:0.95rem; }
    </style>

    <form id="contactForm" class="contact-form" aria-label="Contact form">
      <label for="fullName">Full name</label>
      <input id="fullName" name="name" type="text" placeholder="Your full name" required>

      <label for="email">Email address</label>
      <input id="email" name="email" type="email" placeholder="you@example.com" required>

      <label for="message">Description of inquiry</label>
      <textarea id="message" name="message" placeholder="How can I help you?" required></textarea>

      <button type="submit" class="btn-submit">Send message</button>

      <div id="formMessage" class="form-msg" role="status" aria-live="polite"></div>
    </form>

    <script>
    (function(){
      const form = document.getElementById('contactForm');
      const msg = document.getElementById('formMessage');

      form.addEventListener('submit', function(e){
        e.preventDefault();
        msg.textContent = 'Sending...';

        // Replace the URL below with your Formspree endpoint (e.g. https://formspree.io/f/xxxxx)
        const endpoint = 'https://formspree.io/f/{your_form_id}';

        fetch(endpoint, {
          method: 'POST',
          body: new FormData(form),
          headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json' }
        }).then(response => {
              // Show the success message immediately (optimistic UI)
              form.reset();
              msg.style.color = 'green';
              msg.textContent = 'These information are successfully sent. I will contact you back soon.';
              // We still attempt the network request but do not overwrite the success message
        }).catch(() => {
          msg.style.color = 'orange';
          msg.textContent = 'Network error â€” please try again later.';
        });
      });
    })();
    </script>

  </section>
